about_the_game:
Background of the Game‌:
This game is inspired by a Chinese folktale, "The Race of Tianji's Horses." The story revolves around a horse race between two sides, each with three horses of different grades: superior, medium, and inferior. The competition consists of three rounds, with one horse from each side participating in each round. The winner is determined by a two-out-of-three rounds victory. The key to winning lies in the strategic arrangement of the horses' order of participation.

‌Gameplay‌:

  • ‌Core Mechanism‌: Compare the numerical values of poker card faces.

  • Use a standard 54-card poker deck, shuffle, and divide into two piles, with each player selecting one.

  • Start a major round where both players draw the top three cards from their piles simultaneously for a minor round.

  • Play one card per minor round based on the card's face value.

  • When two cards from both sides are in play, they confront each other, leading to changes in health points. Both sides start with 100 health points.

  • The game ends when a player's health points reach zero, followed by reward calculation and rating. Other rare end conditions exist.

  • Chip skills: There are eight types of chip skills that can be experienced during gameplay.

  • Earned EXP can be exchanged for detailed game rules and unique summons.

‌Additional Game Notes‌:

  • ‌Single-Player Mode‌: The opponent is computer-controlled.

  • ‌Randomness with Limits‌: The game incorporates randomness, but it is bounded. Some computer actions follow predictable patterns.

  • ‌Quick Gameplay‌: Each game session is estimated to be less than 10 minutes.

  • ‌Complete Accessibility‌: This is not a stage-based game, allowing players to experience all content immediately. The combination of poker cards, skills, and the order of play offer endless possibilities, ensuring a unique experience each time.

  • ‌Balance of Luck and Skill‌: The game is designed to balance luck and skill, providing a mix of overwhelming victories, sudden defeats, comeback wins, and unexpected losses, offering a thrilling and nostalgic gaming experience.

  • Gaming Experience：In this game, you can fully experience every sensation, from dominating opponents to being defeated instantly, from turning the tide against adversity to suffering reversals when seemingly in control. This long-lost sense of excitement is truly thrilling!

short_description: Origin & Inspiration‌: Derived from the Chinese fable "‌The Race of Tian Ji's Horses‌". Light strategy 3D card game. Top-down perspective. Turn-based gameplay. Compares poker card numbers. Players control all actions through ‌mouse clicks‌. Offers a joyful gaming experience.
